title: Crab Cakes
steps: Pick through crabmeat for shells, keeping lumps intact.
Whisk mayo, egg yolk, mustard, Worcestershire, Old Bay, parsley.
Gently fold in crabmeat and ¼ cup panko. Don't break up lumps.
Form into 4 patties. Coat with remaining panko.
Cook in butter over medium until golden, 3-4 minutes per side.
Serve with lemon and tartar sauce.
